00016 // Initialise All stuff needed by the ServiceControl Layer
00017 
00018 // Objects to prevent multiple access
00019 static Mutex OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex;
00020 
00021 static unsigned int OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount = 0;
00022 
00023 // Function to do mandatory init/reset operations
00024 
00025 // Init Xml parser
00026 static void InitXmlParser()
00027 {
00028     // Just call the xmlInitParser
00029     //xmlInitParser();
00030     LIBXML_TEST_VERSION
00031 }
00032 
00033 static void FreeXmlParser()
00034 {
00035     // Call the free function of libxml
00036     xmlCleanupParser();
00037 }
00038 
00039 // Init for DnsSdProxy
00040 static void DnsSdProxyLaunch(bool Init)
00041 {
00042     static DnsSdProxy * MainProxyInstance = (DnsSdProxy *)NULL;
00043 
00044     if ( Init == true )
00045     {
00046         MainProxyInstance = new OMISCID_TLM DnsSdProxy;
00047     }
00048     else
00049     {
00050         if ( MainProxyInstance != (DnsSdProxy *)NULL )
00051         {
00052             delete MainProxyInstance;
00053             MainProxyInstance = (DnsSdProxy *)NULL;
00054         }
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitClass::OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitClass()
00059     : OmiscidComLayerInitClass()
00060 {
00061     // Enter locker
00062     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex.Lock(); // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00063 
00064     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount++;
00065     if ( OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount == 1 )
00066     {
00067         // First instance, do init for this System
00068 
00069         // now init this layer
00070         OmiscidTrace( "Init ServiceControl layer\n" );
00071 
00072         // Added for compatibility reasons
00073         char * Option = getenv( "OMISCID_DNSSD_FACTORY" );
00074         if ( Option != NULL )
00075         {
00076             // Warn user about this env variable : we do not use it at run time in C++
00077             OmiscidError( "OMISCID_DNSSD_FACTORY is not use by non Java version of OMiSCID. You must choose how to access DNSSD at compile time.\n" );
00078         }
00079 
00080         // Added for compatibility reasons
00081         Option = getenv( "OMISCID_DNSSD_FACTORY_VERBOSE_MODE" );
00082         if ( Option != NULL )
00083         {
00084             // Warn user about how we access to DNSSD
00085 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00086             OmiscidError( "OMiSCID is currently compiled to use Avahi as DNSSD stack.\n" );
00087 #else
00088             OmiscidError( "OMiSCID is currently compiled to use mdns (from Apple) as DNSSD stack.\n" );
00089 #endif
00090         }
00091 
00092         // Init XmlParser
00093         InitXmlParser();
00094 
00095         // Init Service Control global variables
00096         CommonServiceValues CommonServiceValuesInitObject;
00097         CommonServiceValuesInitObject.InitFromLayer();
00098 
00099         // Init DnsSdProx
00100         DnsSdProxyLaunch(true);
00101     }
00102 
00103     // Leave locker
00104     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex.Unlock();       // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00105 }
00106 
00107 OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitClass::~OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitClass()
00108 {
00109     // Enter locker
00110     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex.Lock(); // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00111 
00112     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount--;
00113     if ( OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount == 0 )
00114     {
00115         // Last instance, do reset for Layer System
00116 
00117         // Free DnsSdProx
00118         DnsSdProxyLaunch(false);
00119 
00120         // Free XmlParser
00121         FreeXmlParser();
00122 
00123         // now init this layer
00124         OmiscidTrace( "Free ServiceControl layer\n" );
00125     }
00126 
00127     // Leave locker
00128     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex.Unlock();       // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00129 }
